channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Oscar Mayer Wienermobile Crashes Along Chicago Area Highway
item.description: The hot dog-shaped vehicle hit a car Monday morning and its driver lost control and overcorrected, causing it to roll onto its side on I-294.

item.title: Leftover avocado will stay 'green for days' if you use these simple storage tricks
item.description: A 'Culinary Scientist Chef' on has explained how you can keep avocado fresh for days with four simple hacks, meaning you'll never have to waste leftover halves again

item.title: Sharks ‘high on cocaine’ after drugs are being flushed down the loo
item.description: It could be affecting their behaviour making them more aggressive.

item.title: Little-known Xbox feature was 'lightyears ahead of its time' – and people want it back
item.description: A little-known Xbox feature has been praised as 'ahead of its time' and nostalgic Xbox 360 gamers are wanting the Netflix app, which let users watch films with their friends, back

item.title: Psychic who envisioned Trump assassination attempt gives his US election prediction
item.description: 'I wasn't expecting this to happen until at least August this year.'

item.title: Beautiful 124-year-old attraction that looks like something from a Disney film
item.description: A stunning building that looks like its from the set of a fairytale film is due to reopen to the public briefly this summer before renovation work continues on it ready for its grand opening in 2025

item.title: 14 children end up in hospital after trying ‘adult only’ crisps
item.description: The 'R18' crisps are made using an extract from the ultra-spicy ghost pepper.

item.title: DVLA warning to everyone over 70 told to take action or face fines
item.description: The DVLA has issued an alert and has flagged up six conditions people must report as well as the need to renew licences

item.title: Woman describes out of body aura she felt in near-death experience after crash
item.description: 'The experience has allowed me to see the beauty of life.'

item.title: 'Hidden gem' UK beach with crystal clear water can only be accessed by tunnel
item.description: Globetrotter Chloe Lawford recommends this stunning beach for a sunny day this summer. It's hidden on the other side of a mesmerising tunnel network built in the 1820s
